comments:
I can get this NPE when adding a secondary table to an XmlEntity with corresponding Java entity that has a secondary table annotation.  If you type in the secondary table element with "" for the name you get this exception.  Or if you then fill in the secondary table name with the same one as the java.  Also, if you were to add the secondary table through the JPA details view you get this exception.  This does not occur if the java does not have a secondaryTable annotation.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.PrimaryKeyJoinColumnContext.buildDefaultName(PrimaryKeyJoinColumnContext.java:35)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.PrimaryKeyJoinColumnContext.buildDefaultReferencedColumnName(PrimaryKeyJoinColumnContext.java:27)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.AbstractJoinColumnContext$1.getDefault(AbstractJoinColumnContext.java:41)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.orm.XmlPrimaryKeyJoinColumn.refreshDefaults(XmlPrimaryKeyJoinColumn.java:427)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.AbstractJoinColumnContext.refreshDefaults(AbstractJoinColumnContext.java:31)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.SecondaryTableContext.refreshDefaults(SecondaryTableContext.java:52)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.XmlEntityContext.refreshDefaults(XmlEntityContext.java:132)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.MappingFileContext.refreshDefaults(MappingFileContext.java:98)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.PersistenceUnitContext.refreshDefaults(PersistenceUnitContext.java:241)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaProjectContext.refreshDefaults(BaseJpaProjectContext.java:158)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaProjectContext.refreshDefaults(BaseJpaProjectContext.java:151)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaPlatform.resynch(BaseJpaPlatform.java:201)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.JpaProject$1.run(JpaProject.java:176)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
